Name: Ring Racer
About the game: Ring Racer is a sci-fi endless runner where you explore procedural generated galaxies. Race on huge orbital spacestracks for fame and glory. You can upgrade your ship by collecting credits throughout the race or use your blasters to clear out space debris. Ships come with a rechargeable booster, but speed isn't everything. The further you get into the galaxy the faster you will go. Features Unique Flight Mechanic Procedural generated galaxies with spacetracks 4 Spaceships 8 Unique areas Note: Mouse only game
